personalInfo.name: Mia Isidore
personalInfo.tagline: High School Student & Aspiring Web Developer
personalInfo.aboutMe: I'm a 17-year-old student with a passion for building things on the web. I'm currently creating websites for free to gain valuable experience and build a strong portfolio. My goal is to create clean, modern, and user-friendly websites for small businesses, clubs, or individuals.
personalInfo.contactDescription: Have a project in mind or just want to connect? My inbox is always open.

projects.title: The Coffee Corner
projects.tileDescription: A warm, responsive website for a local coffee shop.

projects.title: ProTutor Landing Page
projects.tileDescription: A clean, professional landing page for a tutoring service.

projects.title: Level Up Gaming Club
projects.tileDescription: A modern, dark-themed site for a school gaming club.
